original_text: And he said, “Behold, I am making a covenant. Before all your people I will do marvels, such as have not been created in all the earth or in any nation. And all the people among whom you are shall see the work of the Lord, for it is an awesome thing that I will do with you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 보라 내가 언약을 세우나니 곧 내가 아직 온 땅 아무 국민에게도 행하지 아니한 이적을 너희 전체 백성 앞에 행할 것이라 네가 머무는 나라 백성이 다 여호와의 행하심을 보리니 내가 너를 위하여 행할 일이 두려운 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: Before all your people I will do marvels,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 모든 백성 앞��서 기이한 일을 행하리니,

sentences.original_text: such as have not been created
in all the earth or in any nation.
And all the people among whom you are
shall see the work of the Lord,
for it is an awesome thing
that I will do with you.”
